title: Adaptive Mobile Learning for Mastery of Coordinate Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometry concepts and graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, aiming to enhance scientific data visualization capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain the position of a point in a three-dimensional coordinate system.
Learners can solve spatial reasoning problems involving integrated coordinate concepts presented simultaneously with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their conceptual understanding by 30% within one week based on feedback provided in an adaptive system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
